channel.title: [pi]Adding shops to Npc help[317]
channel.description:
Idk whats wrong but it's not working... I need to add a shop to an npc here is what i have...
shop.java [code]shop = 29 Pk_point_shop 1 1 10548 10 6570 10 11694 10 11696 10 11700 10 11698 10 11730 10 15001 10 11720 10 11722 10 11718 10 11724 10 11726 10 11283 10 15018 10 15019 10 15020 10 15220 10 13736 10 13734 10 11663 10 11664 10 11665 10 8842 10 8839 10 8840 10[/code]
npc2.java [code]def npcClick2_1282(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(29) [/code] whenever i spawn the npc and trade him the shop opens, but there is no items in it... Can anyone help?
HOWEVER THESE WORK shop.java [code]shop = 1 Donator_shop 1 1 15000 10 13899 10 13902 10 13738 10 13740 10 13742 10 13744 10 14998 10 15018 10 15019 10 15220 10 15020 10 13858 10 13861 10 13864 10 13887 10 13893 10 13905 10 13884 10 13890 10 13896 10 13870 10 13873 10 13876 10 13883 10 13879 10 15037 10 15009 10 15010 10 15011 10 15012 10 [/code]
npc2.java [code]def npcClick2_522(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(1)[/code] I don't understand ?.?

item.title: [pi]Adding shops to Npc help[317]
item.dc:creator: @Silivion Silivion
item.description:
@Silivion wrote:

[quote=“ApocalypseX, post:4, topic:401949”][quote author=Silivion link=topic=499003.msg3649114#msg3649114 date=1309600388]
Idk whats wrong but it’s not working… I need to add a shop to an npc
here is what i have…

shop.java

npc2.java

def npcClick2_1282(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(29)
whenever i spawn the npc and trade him the shop opens, but there is no items in it… Can anyone help?

HOWEVER THESE WORK
shop.java

shop = 1 Donator_shop 1 1 15000 10 13899 10 13902 10 13738 10 13740 10 13742 10 13744 10 14998 10 15018 10 15019 10 15220 10 15020 10 13858 10 13861 10 13864 10 13887 10 13893 10 13905 10 13884 10 13890 10 13896 10 13870 10 13873 10 13876 10 13883 10 13879 10 15037 10 15009 10 15010 10 15011 10 15012 10

npc2.java

def npcClick2_522(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(1)
I don’t understand ?.?
[/quote]
Actually, if you’re using PI… Add your case to Actionhandler.

case [NPCID]:
c.getShops().openShop(SHOPID);
break;

Make sure though, that you add it under firstClickNPC, or secondClickNPC. :D[/quote]

Thanks! it worked, i was just curious on if you knew why every single tutorial i followed all told me to edit the npc2.java file, they said absolutely nothing about the actionhandler thanks, i’d rep++ if i could

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]Adding shops to Npc help[317]
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

[quote=“Silivion, post:1, topic:401949”]Idk whats wrong but it’s not working… I need to add a shop to an npc
here is what i have…

shop.java

npc2.java

def npcClick2_1282(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(29)
whenever i spawn the npc and trade him the shop opens, but there is no items in it… Can anyone help?

HOWEVER THESE WORK
shop.java

shop = 1 Donator_shop 1 1 15000 10 13899 10 13902 10 13738 10 13740 10 13742 10 13744 10 14998 10 15018 10 15019 10 15220 10 15020 10 13858 10 13861 10 13864 10 13887 10 13893 10 13905 10 13884 10 13890 10 13896 10 13870 10 13873 10 13876 10 13883 10 13879 10 15037 10 15009 10 15010 10 15011 10 15012 10

npc2.java

def npcClick2_522(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(1)
I don’t understand ?.?[/quote]
Actually, if you’re using PI… Add your case to Actionhandler.

case [NPCID]:
c.getShops().openShop(SHOPID);
break;

Make sure though, that you add it under firstClickNPC, or secondClickNPC.

Read full topic
